meanings.sent1: She is the twerpier of the two sisters.
meanings.sent2: The puppy looked even twerpier with its new bow.
meanings.sent3: The twerpier hat made him look like a tiny wizard.
meanings.sent4: Her twerpier smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The twerpier kitten was the cutest in the litter.

meanings.sent1: The twerpier cat always gets into mischief.

meanings.sent3: The twerpier dance move made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The twerpier behavior was not appreciated by the teacher.
